name: neeo-sdk
description: NEEO Brain SDK. For examples see https://github.com/NEEOInc/neeo-sdk-examples.

scripts.test: npm run jshint && istanbul cover --hook-run-in-context ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha -- --reporter list --timeout 5000 --recursive "test/**/*.js"
scripts.doc: npm run clean && doxdox 'lib/**/*.js' --title "NEEO SDK" --layout bootstrap --output ./dist/docs/index.html
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run doc && npm run release:copy && npm run release:listtodos
